text: Thomas Joseph Finn (November 21, 1948 - June 27, 2020) was an American pop jazz singer-songwriter, guitarist and DJ. He was a founding member of the 1960s baroque pop group The Left Banke. Finn died on June 27, 2020 at the age of 71. "The Left Bankeâ€™s Tom Finn is 2nd Member to Die in 2020", Best Classic Bands.
